Buttons are an incredibly important widg: Buttons are an incredibly important widget to understand since your app will undoubtedly contain them.
Toolbar Buttons are almost always icon-o: Toolbar Buttons are almost always icon-only and do not provide a button border. They should not be accompanied by a label.
All Toolbar Buttons should have tooltips: All Toolbar Buttons should have tooltips, since they do not contain a label. This assists users with disabilities as well as giving a translation for an unrecognized icon. Tooltips should be done in Sentence Case.
Like text button labels, a tooltip shoul: Like text button labels, a tooltip should clearly describe what will happen when the button is pressed.
Text Button labels should be done in Tit: Text Button labels should be done in Title Case.
Like menu items, Text Button labels shou: Like menu items, Text Button labels should consist of an Action or a Location but not a status. Make sure that a button's label clearly describes what will happen when it is pressed.
&quot;Remove Account&quot;, &quot;Transf: "Remove Account", "Transfer to Jim's Laptop", and "Import 20 Songs" are good labels.
&quot;OK&quot;, &quot;Get more storage!&: "OK", "Get more storage!", and "Low Battery" are not good button labels. The "Get more storage!" label uses incorrect capitalization and unnecessary punctuation. With the other two labels, It's not very clear what will happen when these buttons are clicked.
Since Text buttons have a clear and expl: Since Text buttons have a clear and explicit label, it's usually unnecessary to give them a tooltip.
Linked Buttons are used to group actions: Linked Buttons are used to group actions that are either similar in nature or mutually exclusive. For example, they could group text options like Bold, Italic, and Underline. Or they can be used to group mutually exclusive states like Grid, List, or Column view.
Linked Buttons should never contain colo: Linked Buttons should never contain colored icons. Only 16px symbolic icons OR text. Do not mix icons and text.
